projects.title: Customer Segmentation

projects.title: Optimizing Library Management
projects.description:
Developed a scalable database solution using cloud technologies to enhance library management. Leveraged PostgreSQL's robust features, including referential integrity and concurrent access, to streamline operations. projects.title: Wireless Sensor Networks with Fuzzy Ant Colony Optimization
projects.description: Analyzed network traffic patterns to optimize data routing strategies in wireless sensor networks using cloud-based technical skills and programming knowledge. Leveraged ant colony optimization algorithms and fuzzy logic techniques to enhance energy efficiency by 20%, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and a deep understanding of cloud technologies. Designed and implemented an innovative solution utilizing Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to further optimize network performance and resource utilization.
